docs.lead_paragraph: The administration said it had become aware of “discriminatory benefit designs” that discouraged people from enrolling because of age or medical condition.

headline.main: Obama Administration to Investigate Insurers for Bias Against Costly Conditions
headline.print_headline: Officials to Examine Drug Plans for Bias

docs.abstract: Obama administration will investigate health insurance plans to determine if they are discriminatory against people with AIDS, mental illness or other costly chronic conditions, and against people of certain age; Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services will focus on companies that participate in federal insurance marketplace; administration issues rules requiring insurers to improve accuracy of publications listing their doctors and hospitals.
docs.snippet: The administration said it had become aware of “discriminatory benefit designs” that discouraged people from enrolling because of age or medical condition.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Consumer Watchdog says a new policy requiring patients to obtain drugs by mail order violates the federal health care law.

headline.main: Group Sues Aetna, Claiming Discrimination Against H.I.V. Patients
headline.print_headline: H.I.V. Drugs are Target of Aetna Suit

docs.abstract: Lawsuit filed by advocacy group Consumer Watchdog against health insurer Aetna claims that it discriminated against people with HIV by requiring patients to obtain drugs only from its mail-order policy, violating health care reform law; many insurers have placed restrictions on specific drugs or increased out-of-pocket costs for drugs in response to rising costs; industry claims that mail-order pharmacies keep costs and premiums down.
docs.snippet: Consumer Watchdog says a new policy requiring patients to obtain drugs by mail order violates the federal health care law.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: A consumer advocacy group has filed a class-action lawsuit against Aetna Inc. saying a new policy violates the privacy of people with HIV and AIDS by requiring them to get their medications from its mail-order pharmacy.

headline.main: Consumer Group Sues Aetna, Alleges Discrimination
headline.print_headline: Consumer Group Sues Aetna, Alleges Discrimination

docs.snippet: A consumer advocacy group has filed a class-action lawsuit against Aetna Inc. saying a new policy violates the privacy of people with HIV and AIDS by requiring them to get their medications from its mail-order pharmacy.

docs.lead_paragraph: The nation's largest pharmacy benefits manager is throwing its weight into the fight over high-cost hepatitis C drugs with a coverage restriction that might ultimately lower prices and improve patient access to groundbreaking treatments for the liver-destroying virus.

headline.main: Is This Any Way to Pick a Company Health Insurance Plan?

docs.abstract: I printed very large blow-ups of these grids, and they covered a table 15 feet by 5 feet — a huge mess, but at least I could walk around the table and see all of the details in one place.
